short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Substitutes terms in Facebook posts to help prevent false-flagged posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designated words and phrases will get munged in posts and comments you submit to Facebook.

Facemunge is a tool that helps users of Facebook submit posts and comments with a reduced risk of getting their posts incorrectly flagged by Facebook's algorithms. This tool will activate every time you submit a post or comment. If it finds that your submission contains a word in a designated triggerword list, it will "munge" that word. The altered "munged" version will still be decipherable by human readers but harder for Facebook's algorithms to recognize.
